translation: The page you have requested is being prepared. Please refresh this page in a few moments to check if it's ready.
{{.ErrCode}} is not a recognized error code.
A configuration file for the client could not be found.
Check that you have typed the URL of the site you want to visit correctly.
Check that all of the components of CENO are running.
Email ceno@equalit.ie with the details of the error that has occurred.
Refer to the README to find detailed instructions about how to handle the specific error you have been presented with.
Download the view and config package and consult the README for installation instructions.
